name: Savage Display
text: With your victory and a roar, you push yourself on with increased savagery.
benefit: When you spend a swift action to make a performance combat check, you gain a +2 bonus on your performance combat check and gain a +1d6 bonus on damage rolls until the end of your next turn. This extra damage is not precision damage.
staminaText: When using this feat, you can spend 2 stamina points to gain a +2d6 bonus on damage rolls (instead of +1d6).
text_zh: 通过胜出和一声怒吼，你激发了自己的猛恶天性。
benefit_zh: 当你以迅捷动作进行演武检定时，你的演武检定+2、并在下轮结束前伤害检定+1d6。此额外伤害不属于精准伤害。
staminaText_zh: 当你使用这个专长时，你可以消耗2点耐力来在伤害骰上获得额外+2d6点伤害（而不是+1d6）。
